updates.slash_commands:
Traditional commands have been disabled, keep using Alonsal by `/slash` commands! Try it now ;D

Note: Can't see my commands? Invite me again by clicking the button below! Also make sure my commands are enabled for all in server integrations under `Integrations -> Alonsal -> Commands`

games.anuncio_game_1:
The Game `nomes_repl`_ it's free until the day `data_repl` over there

Redeem it before date to save `R$valor_repl` and get a copy in your plat_repl account
games.anuncio_game_2:
The Games nomes_repl are free until the day `data_repl over there

Redeem all before date to save `R$valor_repl` and get a copy in your plat_repl account
games.anuncio_dlc_1:
The DLC `nomes_repl` it's free until the day `data_repl` over there

Redeem it before date to save `R$valor_repl` and get a copy in your plat_repl account
games.anuncio_dlc_2:
The DLC's nomes_repl are free until the day `data_repl` over there

Redeem both before date to save `R$valor_repl` and get a copy in your plat_repl account

inicio.titulo: > Oh, make way for me to go through :notes:
inicio.boas_vindas:
Hi! Thanks for adding me to the server!

I leave my website attached below, with all the commands if necessary ;D
inicio.idioma_dica: N√£o fala ingl√™s? Sem problemas! Mude meu idioma agora mesmo com o comando /idioma!

diversao.aviso_1:
Tag two people to test
For example, `.alove @Alonsal @Slondo`

diversao.error_2: get out of here your CA :cow: TTLE, test it with another user

diversao.aviso_1: Enter something in addition to this command, for example `.ana alonsal > odnols`
diversao.sorte: There was a repetition of words! Lucky you?

diversao.nsfw_jaja: Due to the excess of delight, this command can only be used on an NSFW channel.

Write something for this command
For example, `.asans slomdo very cringerrr afff`

diversao.new_badge:
You just won a badge! The `nome_repl` emoji_repl! It will appear on your profile when you use the `/user info` command

You can also pin featured badges with the `/badge fix` command!

jogos.conteudo:
The 1st Game created by SLondo!
How far can you run? Test now!
jogos.rodape: The game may not run properly on mobile phones.

jogos.aviso_1: Enter **numbers only** for the amount of dice and number of faces
jogos.aviso_2: Enter at least 1 die as `.ada 1 <faces>` to be able to run.
jogos.error_1: It is not possible to take more than 50 dice at the same time..
jogos.error_2: It is not possible to draw geometric solids with more than 10,000 faces.
jogos.error_3: It is not possible to rotate geometric solids with less than 4 faces.

jogos.aviso_1: Write as `.ajkp paper` or `.ajkp` for a random match.
Inform at least 2 items for me to choose
jogos.aviso_2: Enter a quantity in numbers such as `.ach [2 s a l 4 d @` and a value greater than zero
jogos.escolho_todos: You entered a number greater than or equal to the number of options, I choose them all!

jogos.aviso_1:
Enter one or more of the items below to play
For example, `.asjkp rock paper scissors` or `.asjkp devil`
jogos.error_1: Write an item that is part of the game, this item is not valid

manutencao.titulo: > Oh open up the way I want to go :notes:

manutencao.link: Contribute by reporting bugs or stealing codes from Alonsal :pray_tone2:

manutencao.conteudo_1:
This bot is sponsored by Baidu and Renato's snack, 40 kinds of snacks, hot dog, fast food in 5 minutes, the biggest snack bar in Extrema, come eat the renat√£o of 4, the complete snack!

:mailbox: Suggest commands or report bugs using the **`/mail <your msg>`**
:page_facing_up: Use **`/git`** to view the Alonsal repository
manutencao.conteudo_3:
**`/support`** - Help maintain and develop Alonsal

-----------------------------
> OTHER RESOURCES
Phrases of **`/cattle`** commands are fully owned by @GadoDecider, all credits go to him. ( https://twitter.com/GadoDecider )
